effect.black_white: Raises user’s Defense by one stage. After this move is used, the power of ice ball and rollout are doubled until the user leaves the field.
effect.black_2_white_2: Raises user’s Defense by one stage. After this move is used, the power of ice ball and rollout are doubled until the user leaves the field.

short_effect.black_white: Raises user’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Raises user’s Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.black_white: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.
